changes: Refined `artwork_1` placement: The original instruction referenced the sofa's old position. The new instruction centers it on the now-open west wall for better balance.
Refined `artwork_2` placement: The original instruction was illogical ('above nightstand_2' on the east wall). The new instruction centers it on the east wall to balance the room.

Replaced `rug_1` and `rug_2` with `area_rug_1`: Two small, separate rugs break up the space. A single large area rug is superior for the 'Cozy Retreat' style, as it unifies the bed and sofa into a cohesive relaxation zone.

refined_placements.bed_1: Centered against the south wall, with its headboard against the wall, directly opposite the main door.
refined_placements.nightstand_1: Positioned to the left (west) of the bed's headboard, against the south wall.
refined_placements.nightstand_2: Positioned to the right (east) of the bed's headboard, against the south wall.
refined_placements.sofa_1: Placed at the foot of the bed (the north end), facing south towards the bed to form a cohesive lounging block.
refined_placements.table_1: Tucked into the northwest corner of the room, against the west wall and just south of the kitchenette.
refined_placements.chair_1: Placed at the table_1, on the east side, with its back to the main room.
refined_placements.chair_2: Placed at the table_1, on the south side, with its back to the bed area.
refined_placements.artwork_1: Mounted on the west wall, centered in the open space between the dining table and the south wall.
refined_placements.artwork_2: Mounted on the east wall, centered to provide visual balance to the room.
refined_placements.plant_1: Placed on the floor in the southeast corner of the room, next to nightstand_2.
refined_placements.area_rug_1: A large area rug placed to define the sleeping area. Position it so the bed, nightstands, and sofa all have at least their front legs on the rug, unifying them into a single visual block.
